bhadon.gloss: the sixth month of the Hindu calendar

bhadrapada.gloss: the sixth month of the Hindu calendar

bhagavad-gita.gloss: (Hinduism) the sacred `song of God' composed about 200 BC and incorporated into the Mahabharata (a Sanskrit epic)

bharat.gloss: a republic in the Asian subcontinent in southern Asia

bhutan.gloss: a landlocked principality in the Himalayas to the northeast of India

bhutanese.gloss: a native or inhabitant of Bhutan

bhutani.gloss: a native or inhabitant of Bhutan
